content.webTitle: Pantsil accused of political naivety after flag incident

fields.headline: Pantsil accused of political naivety after flag incident
fields.bodyText: The Ghanian Football Association has apologised after John Pantsil waved an Israeli flag to celebrate the win against the Czech Republic. The team spokesman Randy Abbey said the defender just wanted to acknowledge the Hapoel Tel Aviv fans who had travelled to Germany to support him. "He was naive. He's unaware of international politics," he said.
